text: Ojo onon rahmati Parvardigoratro taqsim mekunand? Moem, ki rūzī [va maişati] ononro dar zindagii dunjo mijonaşon taqsim kardaem va ononro nisʙat ʙa ham ʙa daraçote ʙartarī ʙaxşidaem, to az xadamoti [mutaqoʙili] jakdigar istifoda kunand va rahmati Parvardigorat az amvole, ki çam' mekunand, ʙehtar ast
